org.mapdb

Class EngineWrapper.ByteTransformEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapdb.EngineWrapper
      • org.mapdb.EngineWrapper.ByteTransformEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine
    Enclosing class:
    EngineWrapper

    public static class EngineWrapper.ByteTransformEngine
extends EngineWrapper
    Wrapper which transform binary data. Useful for compression or encryption

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: Engine
        Close store/cache. This method must be called before JVM exits. Engine can no longer be used, after it was closed.
